author: jvanzyl
msg: Adding targets for the automatic updating of the project descriptor.

author: jvanzyl
msg: Cleaning up some of the logging.
Changing to keep in sync with the testing changes.
Adding a flag to the build that the POM has been loaded. Eventually we
will be able to load the POM once but there is a problem with the <ant>
task in that it does not forward references like it forwards properties
so the POM references aren't available in <ant> calls. This flag is
to prevent the POM from being transformed multiple time when updating
is required. This will all be cleaned up when Ant 1.5 is available.

author: jvanzyl
msg: Modified to reflect changes in the testing. A single directory for
unit tests and a single directory for integration tests.

author: jvanzyl
msg: Keeping the announcment up-to-date for the b3 release.
